item-beltbag-*-sheathpouch-knifes: Knife sheath with pouch for gears
itemdesc-belt-*: Allows equiping belt bags, sheaths, quivers.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-pouch-firearms: Can hold firearms ammunition and equipment.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-pouch-sling:
Can hold sling bullets and sling. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw take from pouch.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-quiver-bolts: Can hold crossbow bolts and loading tools.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-quiver-javelins:
Can hold javelins. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw javelin from quiver.
Press to open

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheath-bows:
Can hold bow. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw bow from case.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheath-swords:
Can store one-handed swords and maces. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw weapon from sheath or put it back.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheath-pistols:
Can store pistol. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw pistol from sheath or put it back.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheath-pistolsoffhand:
Can store pistol. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw pistol into offhand from sheath or put it back.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheath-knifes:
Can store knife. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw knife into main hand from sheath or put it back.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-beltbag-*-sheathpouch-knifes:
Can store knife, rusty and temporal gears. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw knife into main hand from sheath or put it back.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-shoulderbag-*-sling-firearms:
Can store firearms and crossbows. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw firearm from sling or put it back.
This item does not work like IRL sling, and works like a sheath, yes, but it does not need a whole new system because of this.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-shoulderbag-*-sling-shields:
Vanilla shield in recipe is not visible, be ware.

Can store shields. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw shield from sling into off-hand or put it back.
This item does not work like IRL sling, and works like a sheath, yes, but it does not need a whole new system because of this.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-shoulderbag-*-sheath-bows:
Can hold bow and arrows. Press 'R' or 'F' to draw bow from case.

One of the slots is for temporary storage in case of inventory being full.
itemdesc-frontbag-*-sheath-pistols: Can carry up to 3 pistols. When shooting, character will take out new pistol from harness after discharging one in their hand.
itemdesc-frontbag-*-bandolier-firearms: Can hold firearms ammunition and equipment.
setting-comment-hide_colored_variants: Hides extra item variants from handbook. Recipes wont be visible in handbook, but you still can craft items using different materials, like colored cloth or leather.
